AlreadyInitialized().details: Emitted when attempting to initialize an already initialized or locked contract.

Initialized(uint8).details: Triggered when the contract has been initialized or reinitialized.

migrateUserServiceProvidersMapping(uint2.details: Migrates userServiceProviders (serviceType-based) to userServiceProvidersByAddress (serviceAddress-based)Supports batch processing to prevent gas limit issues with large user basesCan be called by owner after contract upgrade to migrate existing dataSafe to call multiple times - will only migrate data that hasn't been migrated yet

params.batchSize: Maximum number of users to process (use 0 for all remaining users)
params.startUserIndex: Index of user to start migration from (0-based, use 0 to start from beginning)

returns.migratedCount: Number of users that had data migrated
returns.nextUserIndex: Index to continue from in next batch (equals total users when complete)

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

migrateUserServiceProvidersMapping(uint2.notice: One-time migration function to move data from old mapping to new mapping

updateAdditionalInfo(string).notice: Update additional info for an existing ledger
